content: make a crochet ladybug and caterpillar to add to your collection or give to a friend stitched in red heart amigurumi prints you can crochet a couple of adorable creepy crawlies from only 1 ball of yarn it s an entertaining pattern that features single_crochet chain and slip_stitch techniques if you re looking for a fun project give this pattern a try yarn for model red heart® amigurumi prints™ 3 5 oz/100 g 242 yds/221 m ladybug/caterpillar 9029 1 ball makes 2 sizing ladybug approx 4 10 cm long caterpillar approx 6 15 cm long
